MeasureDescription: Please add short description of the applied measurement
RelationshipMeasureUnits: Please add units of the applied measurement
RelationshipMeasurePoint: Please add measurement point of the applied measurement
AdditionalMatrixDimensions: Please add additional matrix dimensions of the relmat if existent
AdditionalMatrixDimensionsDescription: Please add description of additional matrix dimensions of the relmat if existent
Weighted: Please add boolean, ie False or True
NonNegative: Please add boolean, ie False or True
Directed: Please add boolean, ie False or True
ValidDiagonal: Please add boolean, ie False or True
StorageFormat: Please add storage format of the relmat
Code: Please add URL to code utilized to compute relmat
